it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi

Class Ping

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi.Ping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Ping
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class Ping: class that runs a thread for every rmi client and ping the server to alert that an rmi client is connected, from the moment the client disconnected from the game, the thread stop to ping the server, so the server knows the rmi client is not available anymore
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    Runnable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int DEFAULT 
      private int id 
      private java.util.logging.Logger log 
      private int PINGSECONDS 
      private RmiHandler rmiHandler 
      private int SLEEPMILLIS 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ping()
      Class constructor: create a Ping type and load from file its settings, so the seconds between every ping of the server and the sleep milliseconds

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private RmiHandler getConnection()
      method that provide the caller of the rmi handler associated with the ping classe
      void run()
      Override methods of the Runnable interface, the thread ping the server if the rmi handler and id aren't null thanks to a remote method client ping that try to call in the server, in this way if the call doesn't work as expected is easy to understand
      void setConnection(RmiHandler rmiHandler)
      method that allow the caller to set the handler associated with the ping class
      void setID(int id)
      method that allow the caller to set the id of the ping, that must be equal to the id of the rmi client

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
